data.text: @ChristianFarah4 I wish I had the answer for that! That’s why I try to keep encouraging everyone to wear their mask and social distance!
@AntoniaKoppMD Why does OHIO have one of the highest rates of Covid in the US?
@RossMyersMD It felt appropriate for the occasion! @DrAmyActon
@AntoniaKoppMD Love the Homage Dr. Amy Acton shirt!!!!!

This is only the 1st step — this pandemic is not over. I will continue to wear my mask, wash my hands, & socially distance, and I encourage you to do the same. But in a year of so much stress & sadness, today I feel a glimmer of hope for a brighter future ✨ (3/3)

Thank you @KizzyPhD & Moderna who brought us this vaccine in record time. Thank you to my fellow healthcare workers & essential workers who have continued to put others first throughout this pandemic. Thank you to @nationwidekids for prioritizing vaccinating residents (2/3)
